title: While I am playing in my custom game, it suddenly said I am attempting to reconnect, then...
body:
_**...then I got disconnected and I can't reconnect until 06:00...
How Come?**_

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC is experiencing a *poor connection* to our game servers. This could be for a number of reasons, but I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
I guess it is it. The problem rarely happens.
